item.title: 138 Combat Help
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Barrick, post:7, topic:435407”]Can you do prayer then please?[/quote]It’s not like that on runescape what’s the point of that I don’t even know how you would base it on prayer?..

Just don’t add 138 combat if you don’t have summoning.

item.title: 138 Combat Help
item.dc:creator: @Barrick Barrick
item.description:
@Barrick wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:4, topic:435183”]Client.java

public int getCombatLevel() {
        int mag = (int) ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 1.5);
		int ran = (int) ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 1.5);
		int attstr = (int) ((double) (getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) + (double) (getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])));
			if (ran > attstr) {
				combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 0.4875)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[22])) * 0.125));
			} else if (mag > attstr) {
				combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 0.4875)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[22])) * 0.125));
			} else {
				combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) * 0.325) 
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])) * 0.325)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[22])) * 0.125));
			}
		return combatLevel;
	}

Player.java

[code]
int mag = (int) ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 1.5);
int ran = (int) ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 1.5);
int attstr = (int) ((double) (getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) + (double) (getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])));

	combatLevel = 0;
	if (ran > attstr) {
		combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25)
				+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25)
				+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125)
				+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 0.4875)
				+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[22])) * 0.125));
	} else if (mag > attstr) {
		combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25)
				+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25)
				+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125)
				+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 0.4875)
				+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[22])) * 0.125));
	} else {
		combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25)
				+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25)
				+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125)
				+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) * 0.325)
				+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])) * 0.325)
				+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[22])) * 0.125));
	}

[/code][/quote]

I added that above, but when I do ::master I am still 126 combat, even if I logout.

Read full topic
